Package edu.ser216.checkers.core

Class CheckersGameLogic

java.lang.Object
edu.ser216.checkers.core.CheckersGameLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
CheckersGame
public class CheckersGameLogic extends Object implements CheckersGame
Implementation of CheckersGame, handles core game logic and game eventflow

    • setSquare

      public void setSquare(int row, int column, char content) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the content at the specified position of the board to the provided content with setSquare(0,0,...) representing the bottom left of the board
      Specified by:
      setSquare in interface CheckersGame
      Parameters:
      row - index of position
      column - index of position
      content - char to be placed
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if given index is not in range
      IllegalArgumentException - if provided content is not a valid piece or empty square

    • getWinningPlayer

      public char getWinningPlayer()
      Returns a value representing the winning player
      Specified by:
      getWinningPlayer in interface CheckersGame
      Returns:
      'x' if player x has won, 'o' if player o has won, otherwise returns '_'

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Switches the turn to the non-active player's turn. If it is 'x' turn, then it switches to 'o' turn and vice versa.
      Specified by:
      nextTurn in interface CheckersGame

      Handles turns for CheckersGUI
      Parameters:
      turn - to be made
      Returns:
      String representing valid turn that was made
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if inputted turn is not valid
